org.apache.hive.streaming

Class StrictJsonWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.streaming.AbstractRecordWriter
      • org.apache.hive.streaming.StrictJsonWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordWriter

    public class StrictJsonWriter
extends AbstractRecordWriter
    Streaming Writer handles utf8 encoded Json (Strict syntax). Uses org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.JsonSerDe to process Json input NOTE: This record writer is NOT thread-safe. Use one record writer per streaming connection.

      • encode

        public Object encode(byte[] utf8StrRecord)
              throws SerializationError
        Description copied from class: AbstractRecordWriter
        Encode a record as an Object that Hive can read with the ObjectInspector associated with the serde returned by AbstractRecordWriter.createSerde(). This is public so that test frameworks can use it.
        Specified by:
        encode in class AbstractRecordWriter
        Parameters:
        utf8StrRecord - record to be deserialized
        Returns:
        deserialized record as an Object
        Throws:
        SerializationError - - any error during serialization or deserialization of record
